about:
Hi, I'm Shashidhar Sunnapu, a dedicated React.js and React Native developer with expertise in building responsive web and mobile applications. My experience spans full-stack development using JavaScript, TypeScript, and Node.js, with a focus on high-performance, scalable solutions. I work with frameworks like React, React Native, and Redux Toolkit, and have a solid foundation in backend technologies such as Node.js and MongoDB.

Currently, I lead a team of freshers, guiding them in project development and implementing client solutions. I am always eager to learn and improve by exploring the latest tools and frameworks, and I enjoy mentoring upcoming developers.
